name: Runbear
description: For companies that have difficulties integrating their own LLM Apps into work processes, we provide no-/low-code software to integrate the LLM Apps into daily work tools, such as Slack or HubSpot.
one_liner: For companies that have difficulties integrating their own LLM Apps into work processes, we provide no-/low-code software to integrate the LLM Apps into daily work tools, such as Slack or HubSpot.
